definition: front/forward/ahead/first/top (followed by a number)/future/ago/before/BC (e.g. 前293年)/former/formerly
to arrange/to line up/file/series/(in data tables) column/(Tw) row

sentences.english: The changes of water sodium metabolism and the PGE2 were detected.
sentences.chinese: 檢測兩組水鈉代謝和尿前列腺素PGE2的變化。

sentences.english: The cause of most women's period pain is tiny molecules called prostaglandins. ?
sentences.chinese: 許多婦女痛經是由叫做前列腺素的微分子導致的。

sentences.english: Indomethacin is used to decrease prostaglandin excretion.
sentences.chinese: 吲哚美辛用來減少前列腺素的排泄。

sentences.english: This prostaglandin imbalance can lead to disease.
sentences.chinese: 這種前列腺素的不平衡會導致疾病。

sentences.english: This article reviews enzyme-catalyzed reactions in prostaglandin synthesis.
sentences.chinese: 本文綜述在前列腺素合成中的酶催化反應。

sentences.english: The relationship between periodontal scaling and prostaglandins.
sentences.chinese: 牙周潔治與前列腺素的關係。

sentences.english: If it isn’t, a second dose of the prostaglandin gel is administered.
sentences.chinese: 如果還沒有開始，會開始使用前列腺素的第二種劑量。

sentences.english: Higher levels of prostaglandins are associated with more severe menstrual cramps.
sentences.chinese: 較高的前列腺素常引起較嚴重的痛經。

sentences.english: Prostaglandins have several effects on the body.
sentences.chinese: 前列腺素有幾個對身體的影響。

sentences.english: Prostaglandins are hormones derived from fatty acids, which regulate reproduction and inflammation.
sentences.chinese: 前列腺素是來自脂肪酸的荷爾蒙，控制生殖和發炎。

sentences.english: C(10)-halogenated prostaglandins have higher potent antitumor activity.
sentences.chinese: 滷代類前列腺素有明顯的抗腫瘤活性。

sentences.english: Prostaglandins counteract the actions of vasopressin and influence of how much sodium we excrete.
sentences.chinese: 前列腺素對抗加壓素的強弱取決於鈉分泌的多少。

sentences.english: It does this by inhibiting the production of the pain producing molecules, prostaglandins.
sentences.chinese: 它通過降低人體內的前列腺素微分子來減輕月經疼痛。

sentences.english: It may work against migraines by blocking inflammatory substances called prostaglandins.
sentences.chinese: 它通過阻斷前列腺素這種炎症物質而治療偏頭痛。

definition: histamine (a biogenic amine involved in local immune responses)
thyroid hormone/thyroxine (used to treat underactive thyroid)
acetylcholine ACh (amine related to vitamin B complex)
